review_title: Can Grow As Much As You Want!
pros: The doctors are kind and treat you with respect unlike I have experienced at other local hospitals. They provide extensive on boarding and a plethora of resources to help inexperienced technicians get their foot in the door! I have seen people grow into management roles and highly respected technical levels with their hard work and dedication. They have high expectations for professionalism and quality care which is not a great fit for those who lack motivation. I have seen many technicians over the years become successful veterinarians as well!
cons: Veterinary medicine is not what many people think it is. It can be long hours, physically demanding, and clients can be difficult. However, it is the most rewarding job if you are passionate and willing to put in work. Shaffer Animal Hospital does a phenomenal job as supporting staff and considering their work/life balance.

job_title: Veterinary Technician Assistant in Oviedo, FL
pros: there’s a lot of cute animals
cons: people are very two-faced here and don’t give TAs the experience they promised
